title: Application of a hybrid BWM-TOPSIS approach for mineral potential mapping
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Eric Dominic Forson, Daniel Kwayisi, Raymond Webrah Kazapoe, Clement Ntori, Solomon Kwasi Adjei, Abu Mahamuda, Shaibu Suleman, Paul Ameyoe, Kennedy Yaw Amedzro
